name: pata
description:
It is a strategic combat game. In order to climb a higher tower, you must give play to the intelligence and courage of the players, because you do not know what challenges will be faced in the tower at the next level, so that the players can enjoy the experience of not letting the level, and bring more novelty.

Players need to control the team to defeat layers of enemies and finally reach the destination.

At first, your army's combat effectiveness was very low. You need to obtain various kinds of equipment (materials) to greatly improve your strength (value).

Players need to strengthen themselves and their strength, otherwise they will only be defeated.

This is a popular game. Warriors, we are looking forward to playing together.

Game Guide

1. The number on the body represents the corresponding combat power.

2. Equip (blue font value) to improve your combat effectiveness.

3. Round based game.

4. When you kill an enemy, you will deduct the enemy's (red font) value.

Game features

1. This is a very magical tower climbing game.

2. This is a classic tower climbing game, where you can take risks one by one.

3. The single player version is very suitable for leisure decompression.
